results.title: Acquired generalised lipodystrophy and type 1 diabetes mellitus in a child: a rare and implacable association.
results.text_hl: We report a case of @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Partial_Acquired</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562448 @@@AGL@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@T1DM@@@ with poor @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ control despite high doses of @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@.

citations.NLM: Kumar R, Pilania RK, Bhatia A, Dayal D. Acquired generalised lipodystrophy and type 1 diabetes mellitus in a child: a rare and implacable association. BMJ Case Rep. 2018 Aug 3;2018():. PMID: 30076164
citations.BibTeX: @article{30076164, title={Acquired generalised lipodystrophy and type 1 diabetes mellitus in a child: a rare and implacable association.}, author={Kumar R and Pilania RK and Bhatia A and Dayal D}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2018}}

results.title: Acquired Generalized Lipodystrophy Associated with Autoimmune Hepatitis and Low Serum C4 Level
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Partial_Acquired</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562448 @@@Acquired Generalized Lipodystrophy@@@ Associated with @DISEASE_Hepatitis_Autoimmune @DISEASE_MESH:D019693 @@@Autoimmune Hepatitis@@@ and Low Serum C4 Level

citations.NLM: Eren E, Özkan TB, Çakır ED, Sağlam H, Tarım Ö. Acquired Generalized Lipodystrophy Associated with Autoimmune Hepatitis and Low Serum C4 Level J Clin Res Pediatr Endocrinol. 2010;2(1):39-42. PMID: 21274335
